sections.heading: Hearing; rules of evidence or courtroom procedures; not applicable
sections.text: In conducting the hearing requested under sections 79-268 and 79-269, the hearing examiner shall not be bound by the rules of evidence or any other courtroom procedure.SourceLaws 1976, LB 503, ยง 21;Laws 1994, LB 1250, ยง 27;R.S.1943,
